mapper.select: select FREE_SEQ, FREE_TITLE, USERS_NAME, FREE_WRT_DATE, FREE_CNT from FREE order by FREE_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: insert into FREE (FREE_SEQ, USERS_ID, USERS_NAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENTS, FREE_WRT_DATE, FREE_MDF_DATE, FILES_SEQ) values(FREE_SEQ.nextval, #{usersId}, #{usersName}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{filesSeq})
